text:
Sepertinya Na Jaemin adalah definisi mencintai Lee Jeno yang berlebihan.
Namun Jeno tak mempermasalahkan itu, justru sang lelaki semakin memporak-porandakan hati si cantik agar Jaemin semakin mencintai dirinya.
"Kenapa kau semakin cantik saja sih Na," puji Jeno ketika dirinya sedang bermalam kepada si manis disalah satu taman malam.
Menyisir anak rambut samping Jaemin, sembari mengusap bibir merah sayu si cantik.
"Jangan terus memujiku seperti itu Hyung," sangkal Jaemin sambil memalu.
"Tapi itu benar, kau benar-benar cantik, mengapa definisi sempurna semua ada di dirimu," celetuk Jeno lagi sambil sesekali mencuri ciuman pada bibir Jaemin.
Entah mengapa hati Jaemin tersedu setiap kali Jeno nya mengatakan hal itu, padahal mungkin kata itu sudah beberapa kali terucap untuk Jaemin.
"Hyung, bukankah kau sudah tau jika aku adalah seorang anak mafia buruan semua orang,"
Entah mengapa atensi Jaemin tiba-tiba mengatakan hal ini.
trans:
It seems that Na Jaemin is the embodiment of excessive love for Lee Jeno.
However, Jeno didn’t mind; in fact, he only intensified the turmoil in the beautiful boy’s heart so that Jaemin would love him even more.
“Why do you keep getting more beautiful, Na?” Jeno complimented as he spent the night with the sweet boy in a park.
Gently tucking Jaemin's sideburns behind his ear, he caressed the soft, red lips of the charming boy.
“Stop complimenting me like that, Hyung,” Jaemin protested, blushing.
“But it’s true; you’re truly beautiful. Why is it that the definition of perfection exists in you?” Jeno remarked again, occasionally stealing kisses from Jaemin’s lips.
For some reason, Jaemin's heart swelled every time Jeno said that, even though those words had been spoken to him many times before.
“Hyung, don’t you know I’m the child of a mafia, someone everyone is after?”
For some reason, Jaemin felt compelled to say this.
